name: Line it Draw: Balls & Mind
description:
Draw it is a fun and catchy game where you face other players.

No need to know how to draw! You will love this fast-paced game.

Unique gameplay
Use common physical knowledge, enjoy solving puzzles by drawing lines or shapes~

Interesting levels
Singe or double balls, fusion balls, color changing balls, multifarious levels make you addicted~

Novel Design
Carefully designed dozens of levels, each has multifarious and artful solutions~

Competing with friends
Share your methods with friends anytime, enjoy the magic of solving puzzles~

Draw it includes:
- Simple gameplay that will make you addicted
- A bunch of words to unlock and collect
- Many objects to draw
- A fierce competition
- A limited time to draw
